newsitem.title: CHINA: S.China offshore oil output 8.48 mln T in Jan-Sept.
newsitem.headline: S.China offshore oil output 8.48 mln T in Jan-Sept.

text.p: China's biggest offshore oil producer, China Offshore Oil Nan Hai East Corp (CONHE), produced 8.48 million tonnes of crude oil in the January to September period, the China Business Times said on Monday.

The company's wells in the South China Sea have been pumping more than 1.0 million tonnes of oil a month since May and CONHE expected to produce more than 10 million tonnes in all of 1996, the newspaper said.
CONHE had discovered 23 oil fields in the South China Sea and had active wells on eight, it said, adding that the region accounted for 75 percent of China's offshore oil production.
